-- level dimensions and standards levelw = 39 levelh = 13 create_world(levelw, levelh) oxyd_default_flavor = "d" draw_border("st-rock1") fill_floor("fl-black", 0,0, level_width,level_height) SetDefaultAttribs("it-wormhole", {range=0.0, strength=0.0})
